name: Baggins University
description: Pursue academic excellence at Baggins University, where students receive a well-rounded education and gain invaluable life skills in the heart of the Shire.

name: Second Breakfast
description: Start your day off right at Second Breakfast, where you'll find mouth-watering dishes made with the freshest ingredients and served with a smile.

name: Hobbiton Inc.
description: Trust Hobbiton Inc to find your dream home in the Shire, where you'll enjoy picturesque views and a peaceful, laid-back lifestyle.

name: Bigfoot Bakery
description: Satisfy your sweet tooth at Bigfoot Bakery, where you'll find delicious pastries, cakes, and breads baked fresh every day by skilled bakers.

name: Foolery Tech
description: Join the tech revolution with Foolery Tech, a start-up that's changing the world with innovative software and hardware solutions designed for everyday use.

name: Bag End Brewery
description: Raise a glass to good times and great beer at Bag End Brewery, where expert brewers create unique and delicious brews inspired by the beauty of the Shire.

name: Hobbiton Harvesters
description: Support local agriculture and taste the difference with Hobbiton Harvesters, where fresh, seasonal produce is grown with care and sold with pride.

name: Fellowship Foods
description: Keep your pantry stocked with high-quality, locally sourced ingredients from Fellowship Foods, where you'll find a wide range of wholesale foods at competitive prices.

name: Mithril Mines Inc
description: Venture deep into the earth at Mithril Mines, where skilled miners extract precious metals and gems that are sought after by jewelers and smiths across Middle-earth.
